blog.models module

class blog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This class defines the different aspects of the blog class.

Parameters:

  • title (str, required) – The title of the blog post displayed at the top of the page

  • body (str, required) – The body/content of the blog post.

  • works_cited (str,optional) – This is the field that includes the sources used in the blog post. This will be displayed at the end of the body; will display “No works cited” if no sources were used in the post.

  • by_line (str,fixed) – The by line simply displays who the blog post was authored by

  • signature (str, fixed) – This displays a closing signature beneath the by line.

  • date (date, required) – This is the date that the blog post was written, which will be displayed at the top

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

blog.views.index(request)[source]

When called by urls.py, this function will open the blog page called index.html
